transcription: Hey Tohoku, Yamagata, Higashine, everybody! Let's get started, Summer Fest, here we go!  One of the main attractions of Higashine is this! The pinnacle of cherries, the Sato Nishiki. Higashine is the birthplace of the Sato Nishiki, the king of cherries. Higashine cherries were nationally recognized for their high quality due to the hard work of their producers and have now joined the ranks of the special products of Japan. This is expected to increase name recognition and spread the brand even further.  During cherry season, over 190,000 people make their way to Higashine. People who wish to try cherry picking should come between late April and early July. There are all kinds of public relations events using cherries.  We'll fly 10 meters! We'll do our best as Higashine citizens! Let's do our best!  Yamagata prefecture is a hot spring kingdom with hot springs in all the prefectures. There are many good hot springs in Higashine.  for people who want to enjoy hot springs informally. The foot bath set up on one corner of this hot spring town is available to everyone, free of charge.  Everybody clap your hands! Clap your hands everybody! Everybody clap your hands!  Ah!  the world.
